Take a tour

Welcome. For your convenience a recent copy of the opengear.com web site is provided on this Opengear CD so you can browse product information, FAQs and technology articles off-line. You may also like to run the online Management Console demonstration before installing your console server to get a feel for the extensive product features and the ease of configuration:
  • Browse the website on this CD
  • Walk thru the Management Console online

Documentation

The full User Manual and Quick Start for each Opengear product is included on this CD:
  • IMG/IM/CM4000 User Manual
  • KCS6000 User Manual Addendum
  • SD4000 User Manual
  • SDTConnector Manual
  • IP Power 9258 Manual
  • KCS6104 & KCS6116 Quick Start
  • IMG4004-5 Quick Start
  • IMG4216-25 Quick Start
  • IM4208-2, IM4216-2 & IM4248-2 Quick Start
  • CM4116 & CM4148 Quick Start
  • CM4008 Quick Start
  • CM4001 Quick Start
  • SD4008 Quick Start
  • SD4002 Quick Start
  • SDTConnector Quick Start
  • RDP Quick Start
  • VNC Quick Start
  • IP Power Quick Start
  • The latest User Manuals and Quick Starts can also be downloaded from ftp.opengear.com

SDT Connector

SDT Connector will give you point-and-click secure remote access to all systems and devices connected to your console server. You can load SDT Connector client software from the CD on to:
  • your Linux (*nix) computer: sdtconnector-1.x.tar.gz
  • your Windows computer: sdtconnectorsetup-1.x.exe
  • your Mac: sdtconnector-1.x-mac.tar.gz
Alternately you can download the latest SDT Connector release.


Firmware Downloads

  • Download the latest IMG/IM/CM/SD/KCS firmware releases:
    • For IMG4216-25 and IM4216-2/4248-2 download im42xx.flash
    • For KCS6104/6116 download kcs61xx.flash
    • For CM4116/4148 download cm41xx.flash
    • For CM4008 download cm4008.flash
    • For CM4001 download cm4001.flash
    • For SD4002 download sd4002.flash
    • For SD4008 download sd4008.flash
      Release Notes

  • Download the latest SDT for Nagios wizard:
    • SDT for Nagios Wizard
    • Refer the faq on this CD for details on installing Nagios and the Wizard

  • Download the current Custom Development Kit (CDK):
    You can download a CDK for each Opengear IMG/IM/CM4000 appliance from opengear.com/firmware/cdk/. This will be a gzipped tarball and you can obtain details on using the CDK from the faq on this CD.
